statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); printf "\033[36m%s@%s\033[0m \033[34m%s\033[0m | \033[38;5;208m%s\033[0m | \033[32m%s\033[0m | \033[33m%s\033[0m" "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$model_name" "$git_branch" "$(date +%H:%M:%S)"
